title: Publications
text:

Abelenda-Alonso G, Satorra P, Marí-Dell’Olmo M, et al. Short-Term Exposure to Ambient Air Pollution and Antimicrobial Use for Acute Respiratory Symptoms. JAMA Netw Open. 2024;7(9):e2432245. https://doi.org/10.1001/jamanetworkopen.2024.32245
Carmezim, J., Satorra, P., Peñafiel, J. et al. REDCapDM: An R package with a set of data management tools for a REDCap project. BMC Med Res Methodol 24, 55 (2024). https://doi.org/10.1186/s12874-024-02178-6
Llambrich M, Satorra P, Correig E, Guma J, Brezmes J, Tebe C, Cumeras R. Easy‐Amanida: An R Shiny application for the meta‐analysis of aggregate results in clinical metabolomics using Amanida and Webchem. Research Synthesis Methods. 2024 Mar 13:e1713.
Gómez-Vaquero, Carmen, et al. High incidence of clinical fragility fractures in postmenopausal women with rheumatoid arthritis. A case-control study.” Bone 168 (2023): 116654.
Negredo, Eugenia, et al. Accentuated aging associated with HIV in a Mediterranean setting occurs mainly in persons aged> 70 years: a comparative cohort study (Over50 cohort). AIDS care 34.2 (2022): 155-162.
Ronda, M., Padullés, A., Grau, I., Tubau, F., Satorra, P., Shaw, E., Vigués, F. and Carratalà, J., 2023. Impact of a prospective audit and feedback antimicrobial stewardship programme on carbapenem consumption: a quasi-experimental study (IPANEMA study). Journal of Antimicrobial Chemotherapy, 78(7), pp.1705-1710.
Fontané L, Pedro-Botet J, Garcia-Ribera S, Climent E, Muns MD, Ballesta S, Satorra P, Flores-Le Roux JA, Benaiges D. Use of phytosterol-fortified foods to improve LDL cholesterol levels: A systematic review and meta-analysis. Nutrition, Metabolism and Cardiovascular Diseases. 2023 Aug 1;33(8):1472-80.
Tebé, C., Valls, J., Satorra, P. et al. COVID19-world: a shiny application to perform comprehensive country-specific data visualization for SARS-CoV-2 epidemic. BMC Med Res Methodol 20, 235 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1186/s12874-020-01121-9
Valls J, Tobías A, Satorra P, Tebé C. COVID19-Tracker: a shiny app to analise data on SARS-CoV-2 epidemic in Spain. Gaceta sanitaria. 2020 Apr 27;35(1):99-101.

title: About me
text:
I’m a biostatistician with a mathematical background and a master’s degree in data science. I have more than 6 years of experience in clinical research analysis, programming in R and creating shiny web applications & developing new R packages.
Contact
 pau.satorra@gmail.com
 @pasahe

title: About me
text:
Work experience
6 years of experience in two different biostatics unit associated to two hospitals in Spain. My tasks were to perform & design statistical analysis for a wide range of clinical studies, reporting statistical analysis to researchers and clinicians, performing statistical research and web application programming in shiny:

Statistic in Biostatistics Support and Research Unit, Germans Trias i Pujol Research Institute and Hospital (IGTP), Badalona, Spain. 2023-Current



Statistic in Biostatics Unit, Bellvitge Biomedical Research Institute (IDIBELL), L’Hospitalet de Llobregat, Spain. 2019-2023

title: About me
text:
Education

BSc, Mathematics in University of Barcelona (UB). 2015-2019
MPH, Master in Fundamental Principles of Data Science in University of Barcelona (UB). 2021-2023



Postgraduate course on Data Science, applications in biology and in medicine with Python and R in University of Barcelona (UB). 2021
First course of Bsc, Biomedical Engineering in University of Barcelona (UB). 2014-2015
